name: SLICED
description:
GAME

A three player brawler game where each character is divided in three parts: head, torso and leg pieces; each piece giving the player a unique skill. Throughout the game, these pieces switch randomly between players, who have to adapt!

The objective of each player is to score by killing the other players. Players have to adapt as their slices switch regularly during the game, leading to wacky fights!

UNIVERSE
The Cosmic Samurai, bored by his ethereal existence, decides to chop up three parallel universes with his katana, and then mix them up!

Three unfortunate heroes, coming from separate worlds, find themselves in a crazy tournament for the Cosmic Samurai's entertainment… and slices of their bodies shuffled together.

Website : http://www.slicedgame.com/
